column6: Rescuing the life of the pirate captain who wants your father dead? Probably a bad idea. Revealing who you really are to the pirate girl who thinks she's in love with you? Possibly even worse. And doing both while trapped on a hostile planet full of angry Shi'ar? No doubt a fatal error! Tune in for the action-packed climax of "A Pirate's Life for Me," and witness what will no doubt be the horrific deaths of Cyclops, Corsair and the Starjammers!
column8: | artist:Javier Garron | writer:John Layman | penciller (cover):Alexander Lozano
